newsitem.title: USA: Technology Solutions acquireS Bentley Co.
newsitem.headline: Technology Solutions acquireS Bentley Co.

text.p: Technology Solutions Co said Wednesday it agreed to acquire Bentley Co, a consulting company based in Boston, in a deal valued at $19 million.
The transaction will dilute financial results by about $0.02 a share in the first quarter of fiscal year 1998, Technology Solutions said.
Under the terms of the agreement, Technology Solutions agreed to acquire Bentley through a stock, stock option, and cash transaction. Further terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Bentley will become a separate subsidiary of Technology Solutions and will be identified as Bentley Group, it said.

Bentley was founded in 1989 by William Bentley, who focused on customer service consulting solutions, Technology Solutions said. Bentley offers a full range of consulting services that specialize in solutions to internal and external customer support challenges.
